objective: To find a challenging position where i can apply my techical and managerial skills

work.title: Software Engineering Manager

Led the seamless migration of multiple product lines from the web platform to the mobile app, while skillfully reorienting the team to excel with React Native

Launched Premium Connectivity (and paved for future subscription services for vehicles) via web platform

work.title: Mobile Developer
description: Created the NexTaxi Android application to enable users to conveniently reserve and monitor the progress of their requested taxicabs. Seamless integration with the 'TranAir' application facilitates secure and efficient in-app payments.

Demoed application and its functions at annual Taxi, Limousine & Para-transit Association exhibition in San Francisco
